堂舎: (とうじゃ) - large and small buildings, esp. shrines and temples
堅: (ken/kata) - strict , strength, solidity, firmness; armour, armor
堅い: (かたい) - (esp. 固い & 堅い for wood, 硬い for metal and stone) hard/solid/tough; stiff/tight/wooden/unpolished (e.g. writing); strong/firm (not viscous or easily moved); safe/steady/honest/steadfast; obstinate/stubborn; (ant: 砕けた) bookish/formal/stuffy
堅い商売: (かたいしょうばい) - sound business
堅め: (かため) - (ant: 柔らかめ) hardness; firmness
堅める: (かためる) - to harden/to freeze/to strengthen/to solidify/to make (a fist)/to tramp down (snow, dirt); to put together/to collect/to gather/to consolidate; to make secure/to stabilize/to settle down/to strengthen (belief, resolution, etc.)/to establish (evidence); to fortify/to reinforce/to support; (in the form に身をかためる) to wear for a specific purpose (armor, coat, etc.); to swear/to resolutely vow/to sincerely promise; to tie tightly/to fasten; to hold a bow fully drawn
堅信礼: (けんしんれい) - (the Christian sacrament of) confirmation
堅剛: (けんごう) - firm and unyielding; rigid
堅守: (けんしゅ) - strong defense; strong defence
堅実: (けんじつ) - steady; sound; reliable; solid
堅忍不抜: (けんにんふばつ) - (yoji) indomitable perseverance; invincible fortitude
堅忍持久: (けんにんじきゅう) - (yoji) dogged perseverance; untiring patience
堅持: (けんじ) - holding on to; sticking to
堅気: (かたぎ) - honest/respectable; respectable occupation (i.e. not yakuza, prostitute, etc.); person in a respectable occupation
堅牢堅固: (けんろうけんご) - (yoji) firm and solid; stout and durable
堅物: (かたぶつ) - straight-laced or stubborn person
堅白同異: (けんぱくどうい) - (yoji) sophism; sophistry; quibbling
堅目: (かため) - (ant: 柔らかめ) hardness; firmness
堅結び: (かたむすび) - reef knot; flat knot; square knot
堅雪: (かたゆき) - snow with a frozen crust on top; crusted snow
堅頭竜: (けんとうりゅう) - pachycephalosaur (any dinosaur of infraorder Pachycephalosauria)
堅魚木: (かつおぎ) - log on the roof of a shrine set perpendicular to the ridgepole
堆い: (うずたかい) - piled up high; in a heap
堆く: (うずたかく) - piled up high; in a heap
堆朱: (ついしゅ) - red lacquerware with patterns carved in relief
堆積輪廻: (たいせきりんね) - cycle of sedimentation
堆高い: (うずたかい) - piled up high; in a heap
堕す: (だす) - to degenerate; to lapse into
堕する: (だする) - to degenerate; to lapse into
堕ちる: (おちる) - to fall down/to drop/to fall (e.g. rain)/to sink (e.g. sun or moon)/to fall onto (e.g. light or one's gaze)/to be used in a certain place (e.g. money); to be omitted/to be missing; to decrease/to sink; to fail (e.g. exam or class)/to lose (contest, election, etc.); to crash/to degenerate/to degrade/to fall behind; to become indecent (of a conversation); to be ruined/to go under; to fade/to come out (e.g. a stain)/to come off (e.g. makeup)/to be removed (e.g. illness, possessing spirit, name on a list); to fall (into someone's hands)/to become someone's possession; to fall (into a trap)/to fall (for a trick); to give in/to give up/to confess/to flee; to fall/to be defeated/to surrender; to come to (in the end)/to end in; to fall (in love, asleep, etc.); to swoon (judo); to consent/to understand; to crash/to freeze; (of animals) to die; (of fish when it gets cold) to move to the depths
堕つ: (おつ) - (v2t-k,vi)    to fall down/to drop/to fall (e.g. rain)/to sink (e.g. sun or moon)/to fall onto (e.g. light or one's gaze); to be omitted/to be missing; to crash/to degenerate/to degrade/to fall behind; to be removed (e.g. illness, possessing spirit, name on a list); to fall (into someone's hands)/to become someone's possession; to fall/to be defeated/to surrender
堕ろす: (おろす) - to abort (an embryo or fetus) (negative nuance)
堕力: (だりょく) - inertia/momentum; force of habit
堕天使: (だてんし) - fallen angel; demon; Satan
堕獄: (だごく) - going to hell; falling into hell
堕落腐敗: (だらくふはい) - (yoji) debasement; corruption; degradation
堙滅: (いんめつ) - {law} destruction (esp. of evidence)/spoliation/suppression; hiding/concealment
堤を築く: (つつみをきずく) - to build an embankment
堤出: (ていしゅつ) - to present/to submit (e.g. a report or a thesis)/to hand in/to file/to turn in; presentation/submission/filing
堤防を築く: (ていぼうをきずく) - to construct an embankment
堪えかねる: (たえかねる) - to be unable to endure; to be unable to stand (something); to lose patience
堪えない: (たえない) - unable to suppress one's emotions; unable to cope with one's responsibilities
堪えられない: (こたえられない) - really good; irresistible
堪える: (koraeru) - suportar, aguentar, endurecer, tolerar; conter, controlar, manter sob controle; perdoar, tolerar, pardonar
堪え兼ねる: (たえかねる) - to be unable to endure; to be unable to stand (something); to lose patience
堪え忍ぶ: (たえしのぶ) - to put up with; to endure; to bear patiently
堪え性: (こらえしょう) - endurance; perseverance; patience
堪ったものではない: (たまったものではない) - (emphatic form of 堪らない)  intolerable/unbearable/unendurable; tremendous/out of this world/irresistible; cannot help (doing)/cannot but do/anxious to do
